title: 🌍 International Finance & Trade
description: How money moves, is managed, and is regulated across countries — involving governments, businesses, banks, and investors worldwide

lessons.title: 📌 Core Segments: Foreign Exchange (Forex/FX)
topics: Affects import/export prices to travel costs

lessons.title: ⚖️ Balance of Payments (BoP)
topics: Current Account: Trade in goods/services, remittances
Capital Account: FDI, FII, Loans, Investments
India's trade deficit & capital inflows balance
BoP shows if country is net spender or earner globally

lessons.title: 🌐 International Trade & Globalization
topics: Make in India, Atmanirbhar Bharat, PLI Scheme

lessons.title: 📈 Foreign Institutional Investment (FII/FPI)
topics: Short-term portfolio investments in stocks, bonds
Sensitive to interest rates (US Fed, RBI)
FII inflow = market boost; outflow = rupee fall

lessons.title: 💱 Exchange Rate & INR
topics: USD-INR is India's primary forex benchmark
RBI uses forex reserves for volatility management

lessons.title: 🏦 International Monetary Institutions
topics: IMF: Debt/financial crisis help, policy advice
World Bank: Development, poverty projects funding
Backbone of global economic stability and aid

lessons.title: 💰 Sovereign Debt & Global Borrowing
topics: Countries borrow via bonds (US Treasury, Indian Sovereign)
Used for infrastructure, defense, budget support
High debt = inflation + low investor confidence

lessons.title: 💸 Cross-Border Remittances
topics: NRI income via banks, apps (Wise, Remitly, Western Union)
Key to rural incomes, balance of payments

lessons.title: 💼 Trade Finance
topics: Digital Trade Finance rising (Blockchain + SWIFT gpi)

lessons.title: 📊 International Taxation & Treaties
topics: OECD's BEPS rules (Base Erosion, Profit Shifting)
Tax diplomacy impacts MNCs and global freelancers

rows: Countries trading in local currencies (e.g., INR-Ruble)
e-Yuan, e-₹ for fast cross-border payments
Climate standards tied to trade deals
Secure, fast trade documents and payments
Focus on India-EU, BRICS+, Indo-Pacific ties

lessons.title: ✅ India's International Finance Goals
topics: Use digital tech (AA, UPI Global) for fintech diplomacy
Balance forex reserves for oil and gold imports

summary: 🌐 International finance isn't just about numbers — it's how India builds global partnerships, manages crises, and shapes its economic destiny.
